des:
Bryant Evolution® System Control skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now interact with your Bryant® Evolution® Connex™ Control by voice command to control your home comfort system using your Amazon Alexa device.

To get started, select the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa App to link your www.MyEvolution Connex.com account (using your username and password for that account) and discover your system(s).

When using the skill, you need to specify by name, which system, and if applicable, which zones within systems, to use. Note that all names of systems and zones within an account must be unique (duplicate names will cause confusion within the Alexa interface).

• Use the system and/or zone name(s) that you set up already – these are shown in the My Evolution Connex mobile app (touch the system name at the top of the Main screen to see and access all of the systems and zones set up for that account)

• System names can be changed within the www.MyEvolutionConnex.com Consumer Portal (go to My Locations, Edit System, System Name, input the new name, Save System)

• Zone names can be changed within the My Evolution mobile app (select a system from the drop down menu at the top of the Main, touch Menu, Zone Names, select the Zone(s) to rename, follow the screen prompts to save the names)
If you have already linked an Evolution Connex account with Alexa and you wish to link a different Evolution Connex account with Alexa, perform the following steps:

1. Logout of your Evolution Connex account. (go to www.MyEvolutionConnex.com and select Logout)

2. Disable the Bryant Evolution® System Control skill in the Alexa app. (go to Skills, Your Skills, Bryant Evolution® System Control, Disable)

3. Enable the Bryant Evolution® System Control skill in the Alexa app. (go to Skill, Search for Bryant Evolution® System Control, Enable, Input the username and password Evolution Connex Account you wish to link)
